hadiths.text: Narrated 'Imran bin Husain: "The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) prohibited us from (wearing) rings of gold." [He said:] THere are narrations on this topic from 'Ali, Ibn 'Umar, Abu Hurairah, and Mu'awiyah. [Abu 'Eisa said:] The Hadith of 'Imran is a Hasan Hadith. Abu At-Tayyah's (a narrator) name is Yazid bin Humaid

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ خَاتَمِ الذَّهَبِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Gold Rings Being Disliked
